Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific worker to a specific team (1=yes, 0=no).

Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific user story to a specific sprint (1=yes, 0=no).

Name: select_team_size
Description: Integer decision on the number of members for a new team.

Name: set_sprint_duration_days
Description: Integer decision on the duration of a sprint in days, typically in weekly increments.

Name: allocate_feature_budget
Description: Float decision on the budget to allocate for the development of a specific feature.

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Integer decision to set the priority level of a user story, where 1 is highest.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific task to a specific worker (1=yes, 0=no).

Name: set_worker_availability_percent
Description: Float decision on the percentage of time a worker is available for the project.

Name: include_feature_in_release
Description: Binary decision: Include a specific feature in a specific release plan (1=yes, 0=no).

Name: choose_team_type
Description: Categorical decision on the type of a team (e.g., focused on features or components).

Name: update_task_status
Description: Categorical decision on the current status of a task on the Scrum Board.

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: Integer decision to set the severity of a blocker, where 5 is most severe.
